venue.name: Commuter Parking Lot at Service Plaza at Exit 5 off Route 3

item.description:
We'll be joining this AMC hike in the Blue Hills, which starts at 10AM.  Meet us at 7:30 in the Commuter Parking Lot behind the Service Plaza at Exit 5 off Route 3 if you want to carpool to breakfast and the hike.

This is an Appalachian Mountain Club event led by an AMC leader. You can view the hike area on the Blue Hills Reservation map. Find out more about the Appalachian Mountain Club. Dogs are not allowed on AMC hikes.

Thursday Morning Blue Hills Hike Activity: Hiking Status: OPEN A 4-5 mile hike on the Blue Hills Reservation. We will be hiking between Hancock and Great Blue Hill on the Breakneck Ledge Loop. Meet on Hillside Street across from the Reservation Headquarters and the State Police Barracks. (To me, the "between" in the description might mean that we're not going to the peak. I am trying to find out.)

Date(s): December 13, 2012 (Thu) Location: Milton,  Massachusetts, Southeast (excluding Cape),  MA Difficulty: B3C

Offered By: Southeastern Massachusetts Leader: Sue Chiavaroli 
brillo6452@yahoo.com

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Thursday Morning Blue Hills Hike
